name: Slagalica
overview: Slagalica (also known as Sestavljanka) is a Croatian language educational puzzle game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Davor Bonacic, Darja Hudin, Matjaz Colnaric & Mitja Solar and published by Suzy Soft in 1988. Both titles (Slagalica and Sestavljanka translate to Puzzle)
